ARABIC: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My Lord, I fear they will deny me
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: : He said: "O Lord, I fear that they will deny me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "My Lord! I fear that they will brand me a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He replied, "Lord, I am afraid that they will call me a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “My Lord, I fear that they will deny me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "My Lord! Verily, I fear that they will deny me,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: O my Lord! surely I fear that they will reject me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'My Lord, I fear they will cry me lies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: My Lord! Lo! I fear that they will deny me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses replied, "My Lord, I fear they will reject me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: my Lord! verily I fear they shall belie me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘My Lord! I fear they will impugn me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "O my Lord! I do fear that they will charge me with falsehood:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "My Lord! Verily, I fear that they will belie me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My Lord' he replied, 'I fear they will belie me
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “My Lord, I fear they will reject me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:12] He, Moses, said, ‘My Lord, I fear they will deny me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 406 (He said) Moses said: (My Lord! Lo! I fear that they will deny me) I fear that they will disbelieve in the message I bring to them,
